channel.title: python on Sharing knowledge
channel.description: Recent content in python on Sharing knowledge

item.title: Общение со Skype через D-Bus на Python
item.description: #!/bin/sh # Stop amarok dbus-send --session --type=method_call --dest=org.kde.amarok /Player org.freedesktop.MediaPlayer.Stop # Logout from kopete dbus-send --session --type=method_call --dest=org.kde.kopete /Kopete org.kde.Kopete.disconnectAll # Logout from Skype skypeapi.py 'SET USERSTATUS OFFLINE' # Lock screen dbus-send --session --type=method_call --dest=org.freedesktop.ScreenSaver /ScreenSaver org.freedesktop.ScreenSaver.Lock Детали и параметры работы команды dbus-sendописаны в man-странице#!
